events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy
events.description: Live from Salem: Songs of Heresy and Blasphemy with DJ Mercy.

events.name: All Hallows Eve
events.description: Learn how to cook some traditional Samhain dishes like Colcannon, Scalloped Corn and parsnip soup.- The Satanic Chef.

events.name: Halloween Masks & More
events.description: Join TST Oregon for Devil's Rain, narrated by William Shatner

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Meet your new best friend, a fruit bat or insect bat from BatWorld, a shelter in Texas that cares for these sweethearts. Learn more about their work at batworld.org

events.name: Satanic Archives
events.description: The Satanic Panic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.

events.name: Grey Mass
events.description: Grey Masses for Halloween, several pre-recorded Grey Mass presentations from Grey Faction

events.name: Remembering the Dead
events.description: Here we will honor the victims of the witch trials by telling a bit of every single person's story. Not just the few everyone knows

events.name: Infernal Goat Nursery
events.description: Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org
